about_the_game:
This DLC contains the complete Welcome To... Chichester 1 Test Program Ren'Py and VNMaker projects as well as associated graphics online store graphics.

Contents include :

  • Ren'Py project and source code
  • VNMaker project
  • Title graphics over the past year in various sizes

Does NOT include graphics, sound or music used in the program
detailed_description:
This DLC contains the complete Welcome To... Chichester 1 Test Program Ren'Py and VNMaker projects as well as associated graphics online store graphics.

Contents include :

  • Ren'Py project and source code
  • VNMaker project
  • Title graphics over the past year in various sizes

Does NOT include graphics, sound or music used in the program

fullgame.name: Welcome To... Chichester 1/Redux : The Spy Of America And The Long Vacation

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
